src.model

Class Maps

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.model.Maps
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Maps
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is used to instantiate maps, which reads the map files into memory. And then, it validates every map.
    Author:
    Team20
    See Also:
